A.name: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce( max(SPCNUMB)::int+1,1) from @TABLENAME where BUDGETLISTID=@BUDGETLISTID ::bigint and cid=0
A.caption: Номер

A.name: Имя файла
A.formula: select f.filename from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint
A.caption: Имя файла

A.name: Размер файла
A.formula: select f.size from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint
A.caption: Размер файла

A.name: Дата создания файла
A.formula: select f.docdate from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint
A.caption: Дата создания файла

A.name: Настройки фильтра
A.formula: case when @FILTER = 'false' then null else (select b.filterinfo from configcolumnsbuff b where b.id = @ID ::bigint) end

A.name: Тип
A.formula: select u.classnode from units u where u.id = @UNITID::bigint
A.caption: Тип

A.name: Сумма
A.formula: select coalesce(sum(bls.SUMM),0) from BudgetListSpc bls where bls.BudgetListId = @ID ::bigint
A.caption: Сумма

A.name: Исполнено
A.formula: select coalesce(sum(pp.summ),0) from PostPay pp, BudgetListSpc bls where pp.BudgetListSpcId = bls.ID and bls.BudgetListId = @ID ::bigint
A.caption: Исполнено

A.name: Остаток
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(bls.SUMM,0) - coalesce(pp.summ,0) ) from BudgetListSpc bls, PostPay pp where pp.BudgetListSpcId = bls.ID and bls.BudgetListId = @ID ::bigint
A.caption: Остаток

A.name: Исполнено
A.formula: select coalesce(sum(pp.summ),0) as SummExec from PostPay pp where pp.BudgetListSpcId = @ID ::bigint
A.caption: Исполнено

A.name: Остаток
A.formula: select @SUMM::bigint - (select coalesce(sum(pp.summ),0) from PostPay pp where pp.BudgetListSpcId = @ID ::bigint)
A.caption: Остаток

A.name: Разнесено
A.formula: select coalesce(sum( pp.summ ),0) from PostPay pp where pp.PayListId = @ID ::bigint
A.caption: Разнесено

A.name: Остаток
A.formula: select pl.summ - ( select coalesce(sum( pp.summ ),0) from PostPay pp where pp.PayListId = pl.id ) as srp from PayList pl where pl.id = @ID ::bigint
A.caption: Остаток

A.name: КБК
A.formula: select 'N:' ||to_char(bls.SPCNUMB,'999999999')|| ' КБК:'|| COALESCE(k1.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k4.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k5.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k7.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k9.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k12.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k14.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k18.CODE ,'..')|| ' Бюджет: '|| bl.BudgetName|| ' от '||bl.docdate from BudgetListSpc bls, BudgetList bl, KbkIn f LEFT JOIN Kbk10In k1 on f.Kbk10In = k1.id LEFT JOIN Kbk20In k4 on f.Kbk20In = k4.id LEFT JOIN Kbk30In k5 on f.Kbk30In = k5.id LEFT JOIN Kbk40In k7 on f.Kbk40In = k7.id LEFT JOIN Kbk50In k9 on f.Kbk50In = k9.id LEFT JOIN Kbk60In k12 on f.Kbk60In = k12.id LEFT JOIN Kbk70In k14 on f.Kbk70In = k14.id LEFT JOIN Kbk80In k18 on f.Kbk80In = k18.id where bl.id=bls.BudgetListId and f.id =bls.KbkInId and bls.id= @BUDGETLISTSPCID ::bigint
A.caption: КБК

A.name: Код КБК дохода
A.formula: select COALESCE(k1.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k4.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k5.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k7.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k9.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k12.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k14.CODE,'..')|| COALESCE(k18.CODE ,'..') from KbkIn f LEFT JOIN KBK10IN k1 on f.KBK10IN = k1.id LEFT JOIN KBK20IN k4 on f.KBK20IN = k4.id LEFT JOIN KBK30IN k5 on f.KBK30IN = k5.id LEFT JOIN KBK40IN k7 on f.KBK40IN = k7.id LEFT JOIN KBK50IN k9 on f.KBK50IN = k9.id LEFT JOIN KBK60IN k12 on f.KBK60IN = k12.id LEFT JOIN KBK70IN k14 on f.KBK70IN = k14.id LEFT JOIN KBK80IN k18 on f.KBK80IN = k18.id where f.id =@ID ::bigint
A.caption: Код КБК дохода
